Package sweng.campusbirdsguide.presentation.elements

Class PresentationElement

java.lang.Object
sweng.campusbirdsguide.presentation.elements.PresentationElement
Direct Known Subclasses:
AudioElement, CircleElement, ImageElement, LineElement, RectangleElement, TextElement, VideoElement
public abstract class PresentationElement extends Object
PresentationElement is the abstract class which provides all the methods and constants every presentation element needs and must provide.

  • Method Details

    • getViewType

      public abstract String getViewType()
      Method an element provides to inform about the its type
      Returns:
      AUDIO_ELEMENT or IMAGE_ELEMENT or TEXT_ELEMENT or VIDEO_ELEMENT

    • getSearchableContent

      public abstract String getSearchableContent()
      Method used by the adapter to filter search queries.
      Returns:
      The text content of an element, or null if no searchable content should be provided.

    • dpToPx

      protected int dpToPx(int input)
      Utility used to convert DPs into pixels.
      Parameters:
      input - The value to convert in DPs.
      Returns:
      The converted value in pixels.

    • noHorizontalLayoutRulesToApply

      protected boolean noHorizontalLayoutRulesToApply(RelativeLayout.LayoutParams layoutParams)
      Checks if layout rules are to be applied based on the requested screen position.
      Parameters:
      layoutParams - RelativeLayout.LayoutParams of the view being manipulated by the element.
      Returns:
      Boolean, whether no rules have been applied (true) or a rule has been applied (false).
